overview:
Dennis Schneider is an Application Engineer at 6Wunderkinder and is currently working on the desktop application alongside mobile applications for iOS (iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad) and Android. He makes it possible for users to use Wunderlist on the go. He is also working on the application core of Wunderkit.

Dennis helps facilitate user base growth by developing state of the art productivity software. He creates technical concepts and ideas, and implements them on various platforms (web, desktop, mobile) using upbeat coding techniques and methods.

Prior to joining 6Wunderkinder, Dennis studied Computer Science in Reutlingen (in the South of Germany) and in Xi’an (China). He is fully passionate about all things technology and loves coding (especially software architecture and cool coding patterns).
